instructions: With the screen you want to capture displayed, hold down the Power and Volume-down buttons at the same time. The screen will flash after a moment, and you'll see an animation of the screen reducing with share and trash icons on the side. Tap the Share icon to open a quick share menu with a grid of apps you can share to, including your most common texting contacts, your social media apps, and Google Drive. Tap the Trash icon to delete the screenshot from your phone.
